question: Legs are hurting like crazy, HELP!?
question_content: I was at a dance a couple days ago, and we were doing the song Low. We all went straight down, for the whole song. But when I headed back for my table, my legs were hurting like pins were pushing things together, my muscles were like pushing against each other. It hurts to walk, and while walking to each class at school isnt going to do me any work. Any suggestions? Pain killers? Home remedies?

answers.answer_content: You just probably just pulled a muscle it causes sores some pain Advil does help it Will hurt 3-5 days
